snippet: SoundExchange, the agency that compensates performers and record labels when music is played on satellite and Internet radio, reported $292 million in royalties. Also, the Pirate Bay add a promotional site.

snippet: Advertisers distributed more than 272 billion coupons in free-standing inserts in 2011, according to a report from Kantar Media, a decline of 6.5 percent from 2010.

headline.main: Accounts and People of Note in the Ad Industry

snippet: Everyone loves to quote Shakespeare. "To be or not to be" may be the weariest of clichés, but no one will give it the rest it has earned.
